text:
Giuliana Rancic (; née DePandi; born August 17, 1974) is an Italian-American entertainment reporter, businesswoman, and television personality. She is a co-anchor of E! News.
In Chicago and Washington, D.C., Rancic and her husband Bill Rancic own a resturant chain titled: "RPM Steak", "RPM Italian" and "RPM on the Water".
Rancic is a breast cancer survivor.
